item.title: TEstscape
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

testscape is retarted-any time I try to do a command,code something,etc.It doesn’t work.

I downloaded a different source-people actually came to the server and everything was working!

Solution-delete testscape,get a different source.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2007, 10:12:59 PM[/size][hr]testscape is retarted-no matter what I did-commands,codes,making people admins-it never worked.

Then I downloaded a different source and voila! All the commands worked,people actually came,codes worked,making admins worked!

I recommend downloading a different source.

I used-phonescape,Pimpscape,Ultimate PK.

Don’t use cheezscape-it based on testscape ( although it might work well )

Read full topic

item.title: TEstscape
item.dc:creator: @E-Mail_King E-Mail King
item.description:
@E-Mail_King wrote:

First Off, What You Do Is Look For This In client.java

 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Then, Underneath, You Should See Something Like This:

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("someone")) { playerRights = 3; }
All You Have To Do Is Replace ‘Someone’ With Your Account Name, Save Client.java then Compile And Play.

HOPE This Helps

E-Mail King

Read full topic
